text: Spring Voices () is a 1955 Russian musical movie directed by Sergei Gurov and Eldar Ryazanov (who also co-star) and starring Vladimir Salnikov, Nadezhda Rumyantseva, Tigran Davydov. It was distributed by Mosfilm. ==Other websites== * Category:1955 musical movies Category:Russian musical movies Category:Movies directed by Eldar Ryazanov
title: Spring Voices
